name: Shape Switch (J053PH)
description: Shape Switch is a game about platforming which features a 'switch' mechanic. The switch mechanic allows you to toggle between square and circle mode. Square has time altering capabilities whereas circles can fit in smaller areas. I learned a lot from making this game for GeoJam. I reused very few assets from previous projects, and the ones I did reuse I modified heavily such as my player controller and scene transition code. Be sure to leave some constructive criticism on how I can improve the game in future updates, and thank you for playing. I joined the jam late and ended up making this in essentially 24-48 hours and I am proud of the result.
